sentences.sentence: He said the court provided no guidance about when recusal will be constitutionally required.
sentences.translation: 他说，最高法院没有明确指导规定，在什么情况下应该要求取消资格。

sentences.sentence: Tightening rules for recusal would help, says James Sample of New York University’s Brennan Centre.
sentences.translation: 纽约大学布李南中心的James Sample认为强化法律法规会有所帮助。
